text: The pkg server registry is currently >20 minutes behind github. It would be nice to get <https://github.com/JuliaLang/Pkg.jl/pull/2377> finalized and merged, at least for nightlies

text: I just ran into the same issue with a package patch release that was registered about six days ago. I've found chatter here and there about this issue, but haven't found anything pointing to the root cause yet. I imagine the root cause is known and I've simply failed to find it? Any pointers to relevant discussion? :slightly_smiling_face:

text: I believe work is being done behind the scenes to fix the <http://pkg.julialang.org|pkg.julialang.org> registry

text: If you want a fix,  set `JULIA_PKG_SERVER=""` and remove and re-add the General registry

elements.text: If you want a fix,  set
and remove and re-add the General registry

text: :thumbsup: I've been working around the issue by setting JULIA_PKG_SERVER locally, but can't do that so easily on some non-local infrastructure. Hence the curiosity about root cause and such :slightly_smiling_face:.
